nodes.text: The Corellian Skip Run was a secret hyperspace route between Ryloth and Tatooine that was used by most Hutt spice smuggling clans to avoid Imperial patrols and pirates.
The Corellian Skip Run began at Ryloth and ended at Tatooine. This secret hyperspace route paralleled the Old Corellian Run without saving much time, but it avoided Imperial patrols and pirates.
The Corellian Skip Run intersected the Corellian Run, the Death Wind Corridor and the Ryloth Road at Ryloth, and the Crystal Passage, the Tatooine Dash and the Triellus Trade Route at Tatooine.
